overview:
“Mark Uicker is responsible for Sales and Business Development at ClairMail. Mark has over 15 years of success in sales management and business development with previous experience at Commtouch, Kaon Interactive, Elron Software and Inso Corporation. In each organization, Mark shaped the direction, developed processes and produced meaningful growth and market penetration.

Mark has spent his career building relationships with the Fortune 100 and other leading companies - including Wells Fargo, Hewlett Packard, Sun, Lucent, Avaya, Microsoft, Cisco, Sony, Siemens, IBM, Yahoo and AT&T. Mark holds a bachelor’s degree in political science from the University of New Hampshire.” (Source: ClairMail)
